mean_cn: adj. 乐于助人的，随和的，肯通融的；  v. 使适应，调节（accommodate的ing形式），调解
mean_en: willing to do what someone else wants or requests
word_etyma: ac加强 + com共同 + mod方式，习惯 + ate表动词 + ing...的 → 适应他人的习惯 → accommodating 随和的
sentence: He was very accommodating when he opened the car door.
sentence_trans: 他非常乐于助人地打开了车门。
